summary: Ulfric x Tullius fanfiction that no one asked for.
descriptionHtml:
This is 100% a joke mod. Please do not get butthurt (Pun intended).

Way back in the ye olde days of 2013, yours truly wrote a NSFW, very sexual and very gay Skyrim fanfiction between Ulfric Stormcloak and General Tullius engaging in your (not-so) run of the mill yaoi-inspired sexual encounters in class instead of doing the work. (Disclaimer: I barely graduated.) I have now decided to share this monstrosity with you.

20 books, each containing a chapter of this horrid fanfiction.

The books - You guessed it - Increase your one-handed skill, so read all 20 and that's 20 points to your one-handed.

Located where? Castle Dour, of course. Only the man himself, General Tullius would be caught with these books in his possession. 

Why? Why not. 

I'll remind you again, these books may not contain images but they're very sexual and very graphic. Download at your own risk. (Though in my opinion, these fanfics might be the funniest thing I ever did in my teens)

Share it with your friends, here's the fanfiction.net link: https://www.fanfiction.net/s/9744915/1/The-Stormcloak-Experience
(But I'd recommend downloading the mod, theres something 10x funnier about this when reading it in a book in-game)
author: BroMeese
